Title: "Configuring Azure AI Search for Availability Zones and Replicas"
Text:
C:\Users\adamh\Downloads\azure-search.pdfEach replica is placed in a different availability zone within the region. If you have morereplicas than available zones in the search service region, the replicas are distributedacross zones as evenly as possible. There's no specific action on your part, except tocreate a search service in a region that provides availability zones, and then to configurethe service to use multiple replicas.Service tier must be Standard or higher.Service region must be in a region that has available zones (listed in the followingtable).Configuration must include multiple replicas: two for read-only query workloads,three for read-write workloads that include indexing.
Availability zones for Azure AI Search are supported in the following regions:
RegionRoll outAustralia East January 30, 2021 or laterBrazil SouthMay 2, 2021 or laterCanada Central January 30, 2021 or laterCentral IndiaJanuary 20, 2022 or laterCentral US December 4, 2020 or laterChina North 3September 7, 2022 or laterEast AsiaJanuary 13, 2022 or laterEast USJanuary 27,
